name: test_e2e_with_logs[027_SQLI_TIME_018]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_018` |
| **Name** | SQL Server WAITFOR TIME |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `WAITFOR TIME '00:00:05'`
- **Encoded**: `WAITFOR%20TIME%20'00%3A00%3A05'`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~14000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:59:04.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_018-1765465144411-2v8wx pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_018 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20TIME%20'00%3A00%3A05' client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
14:59:04.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_018-1765465144411-2v8wx pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_018 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20TIME%20'00%3A00%3A05' client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
